articles.author: Robert Ilich
articles.title: Elon Musk hopes for ‘zero-tariff situation’ between US and EU - CNN
articles.description: The Tesla CEO’s comments come after President Donald Trump on Wednesday announced 20% tariffs on goods from the European Union.
articles.content: Elon Musk, the worlds richest man and theface of the Trump administrations Department of Government Efficiency, said Saturday that he hopes for a zero-tariff situation between Europe and the United S… [+1548 chars]
